entry.summary: Re SBF: 5) I'm piecing together all of the details, but I was shocked to see things unravel the way they did earlier this week. I will, soon, write up a more complete post on the play by play, but I want to make sure that I get it right when I do.

entry.title: Re h/t @lund_dane
entry.summary: Re h/t @lund_dane Dane Lund: It is worth noting, the ties between FTX and the SEC go beyond in-person meetings. The general counsel of FTX US had served as lead counsel to Chairman Gensler at the CFTC. By all accounts, he is a standup and excellent attorney. The point is that the SEC was pretty close. https://twitter.com/RepTomEmmer/status/1590717374801809409
